name: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
desc: An identifier for an event parameter.

items.name: static let hapticIntensity: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The strength of a haptic event.

items.name: static let hapticSharpness: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The feel of a haptic event.

items.name: static let attackTime: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The time at which a haptic pattern’s intensity begins increasing.

items.name: static let decayTime: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The time at which a haptic pattern’s intensity begins decreasing.

items.name: static let releaseTime: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The time at which to begin fading the haptic pattern.

items.name: static let sustained: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to sustain a haptic event for its specified duration.

items.name: static let audioVolume: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The volume of an audio event.

items.name: static let audioPan: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The stereo panning of an audio event.

items.name: static let audioPitch: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The pitch of an audio event.

items.name: static let audioBrightness: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The high-frequency content of an audio event.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates the identifier of a haptic event parameter with the specified string value.
